## QTL results
Influence of # PCs on QTL detection
```{r}
qtls <- read_tsv(paste0("/project2/gilad/jpopp/ebQTL/results/static/vqtl_ipsc/pseudobulk_scran/basic/IPSC/", seq(1, 10), "pcs/matrixeqtl.cis_qtl_pairs.nhits.tsv"), col_names="n_egenes") %>%
  mutate(n_pcs=seq(10))

ggplot(qtls, aes(x=n_pcs, y=n_egenes)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
```
